video.title: Pinky Dinky Doo
video.synopsis: 7-year-old Pinky and her little brother Tyler use imagination to answer some of life's questions -- all through Pinky's wild stories.

episodes.synopsis: Pinky wears salami on her feet when she can't find her shoes. / Pinky puts so much baking powder in her fluffy buns that her apartment rises up.
episodes.title: Where Are My Shoes? / Pinky Dinky Doo and the Outer Space Fluffy Buns

episodes.synopsis: Tyler fills in at the opera when a famous tenor loses his voice. / Pinky misses show-and-tell day at school when she has a case of the Polka Dot Pox.
episodes.title: Tyler's Great Big Solo! / Polka Dot Pox

episodes.synopsis: Pinky helps a grumpy alligator find a new home. / Pinky attends a birthday party at a fussy club where no laughing is allowed!
episodes.title: Pinky and the Grumpy Alligator / The Horn and Antler Club

episodes.synopsis: Pinky and Tyler are surprised to learn that even pirates have to clean up after themselves. / Pinky investigates some strange sounds at the museum.
episodes.title: Tyler Dinky Doo and the Pirate Crew / Pinky Dinky Doo and the Missing Dinosaurs

episodes.synopsis: Pinky helps Monsieur Guinea Pig paint a portrait of a pizza vendor. / Pinky wakes at night to find a stuffed animal party going on in her living room.
episodes.title: Pinky Dinky Doo and the Pizza Artist / Pinky Dinky Doo and the Party Animals

episodes.synopsis: Pinky uses her Tall O'Meter to make herself grow super big. / Pinky helps two clouds settle an argument over who will carry rain to Great Big City.
episodes.title: Tyler's Tall O'Meter / Pinky Dinky Doo and the Cloud People

episodes.synopsis: Tyler wants to be very scary when he goes trick-or-treating. / Pinky and her class are in for a surprise: Their substitute teacher is a space alien.
episodes.title: Tyler Dinky Doo's Big Boo! / Pinky and the New Teacher

episodes.synopsis: When Pinky is captured by a giant ape, it's Tyler's turn to rescue her. / Pinky shrinks herself super small in order to avoid a new girl at school.
episodes.title: Tyler to the Rescue! / Shrinky Pinky

episodes.synopsis: Tyler misses all the fun when he won't stop playing his video game. / When Pinky forgets about cage cleaning day, Mr. Guinea Pig runs away from home.
episodes.title: Tyler's Too Cool Game / Come Home, Little Guinea Pig

episodes.synopsis: Pinky and Mr. Guinea Pig are tightrope walkers at the circus -- but their tightrope disappears. / A bad hair day could ruin Pinky's class picture.
episodes.title: Pinky and the Super Spaghetti Knot / Back to School Is Cool

episodes.synopsis: Pinky doesn't want to be part of the soccer team but still finds a way to fit in. / Pinky invents something to help a dragon stop spilling his drinks.
episodes.title: Tyler Dinky Doo's Sporting News / Dragon Needs a Sippy Cup

episodes.synopsis: Tyler won't take a bath and gets so dirty that he starts to look like a monster. / Pinky must save the city when it literally rains cats and dogs.
episodes.title: Tyler Dinky Doo and the Legend of Twigfoot / Pinky and the Big Rainy Day

episodes.synopsis: Pinky tries to fix things that keep going wrong at the Great Big Costume Contest. / Sr. Pedro the penguin gets invited to a casual-dress barbeque.
episodes.title: Pinky's Awful Good Day / Tyler's Neat-o Tuxedo

episodes.synopsis: On a hot summer day, Pinky looks out the window and sees everything's covered in snow! / It's concert day at school and Pinky forgets her French horn.
episodes.title: Pinky's Wintery Dintery Doo / Pinky's Great Big Concert

episodes.synopsis: Pinky attends a giant cheese festival, but all of the cheese goes missing! / Miss Zero asks Pinky to be the judge of her planet's bake-off.
episodes.title: The Great Big Cheese Chase / Try It, You'll Like It...Pretty Much

episodes.synopsis: Pinky uses her duplicator machine to make copies of herself. / Tyler and Daffinee are taken in by toy commercials and want to collect them all.
episodes.title: Pinky Dinky Duplicate / I Want That

episodes.synopsis: Superhero Boom Sonic Boom comes to the aid of Great Big City on his superpowered wheelchair. / Tyler wants to take home a frog he finds in the park.
episodes.title: Boom! Sonic Boom! / Pinky the Pet

episodes.synopsis: Pinky brings home a guppy, Specs, who tries to escape from his aquarium. / Pinky and Tyler don't think their new robot babysitter will be any fun.
episodes.title: Guppy Training Day / Pinky and the Babysitter

episodes.synopsis: Tyler and Pinky try to decipher a treasure map they found. / Jackson is at Tyler's for a sleepover, but when the lights go out, he can't sleep.
episodes.title: Tyler's Lucky Sock / Tyler's Best Sleepover Ever

episodes.synopsis: Pinky's class is having a talent show. / Pinky and Tyler clean their room, but Mr. Guinea Pig can't find his trumpet to mark the stupendous moment!
episodes.title: Pinky's Big Talent / Pinky Dinky Re-Doo

episodes.synopsis: Tyler needs to make a poster for school about his family but thinks they're too ordinary. / Pinky opens an ice cream stand on a hot summer day.
episodes.title: Tyler's Super Family / Pinky and the Ice Cream Babies

episodes.synopsis: The Dinky Doos discover Mr. Guinea Pig has a secret bone collection. / Mr. Guinea Pig writes a song to make Pinky feel better, and it becomes a hit.
episodes.title: Mr. Guinea Pig and the Big Bone / Mr. Guinea Pig, Superstar

episodes.synopsis: When everything turns pink in Great Big City, Pinky investigates. / It's the super bike race, and Daffinee's poodle bike is yipping out of control.
episodes.title: Pinky and the Pink Phenomenon / Two Wheel Dreams

episodes.synopsis: At Tyler's bedtime, a magic Genie Pig appears to grant him three wishes. / Tyler and Mr. Guinea Pig are hoping their loose teeth will fall out.
episodes.title: Go to Bed, Tyler! / Mr. Guinea Pig's Loose Tooth

episodes.synopsis: Tyler doesn't like it when things change. Pinky tells him a story about Grandma Dinky Doo. / Pinky encounters a tiny ladybug who's scared to fly.
episodes.title: Think Pink / Tyler's First Flight

episodes.synopsis: Tyler builds a fort, but he's afraid to play with it because he doesn't want to knock it down.
episodes.title: Pinky and the Castle of Cards / Daddy's Special Shirt
